summary: BRAKE SWITCH INOP.  THE BRAKE SWITCH GOES OUT REQUIRING THE MANUAL OVER-RIDE TO SWITCH THE CAR OUT OF PARK.  THE PROBLEM IS WHEN THE SWITCH GOES OUT, ALL OF THE BRAKE LIGHTS ARE INOPERABLE.  THIS HAS HAPPENED THREE TIMES IN THE LAST YEAR AND A HALF.  WE HAVE OWNED OUR 1999 HONDA ACCORD EX SINCE IT WAS NEW AND WE ARE NOW GOING ON OUR FOURTH BRAKE SWITCH.  THIS LAST OCCURENCE IT APPEARS TO BE INTERMITENT.  SO I DO NOT KNOW FOR HOW LONG WE HAVE BEEN DRIVING WITH REAR BRAKE LIGHTS NOT WORKING EVERY TIME WE USE OUR BRAKES.  THE MILEAGE AND DATES OF REPLACEMENT ARE AS FOLLOWS:          NOV  2001        34,000 MILES          MAY 2002         40,000 MILES          FEB 2003          53,865 MILES
